content: Great news, just in time for the weekend: Spain has just become the 6th EU member state whose government has expressed support for the #CLAIRE vision, joining BE, CZ, IT, LU and SK: claire-ai.org/support-spain/ ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡ºðŸŽ‰âœ¨
Thanks to all our supporters in Spain who made this happen! Let's see who's next ...

Meanwhile, any help we can get in spreading the word about this important increase in momentum will be much appreciated (please consider using social media, mainstream media contacts, ...). If you feel you can leverage this to get your own government to send us a letter of support, please go ahead - we will certainly do the same!
